title: Ambient Video Game Music - Japan 4
description: Step once again into the mesmerizing soundscape of Japan with "Japan Ambience 4". Building upon the legacy of our esteemed series, this latest compilation offers a fresh set of 10 ambient tracks.
longDescription:
Step once again into the mesmerizing soundscape of Japan with "Japan Ambience 4". Building upon the legacy of our esteemed series, this latest compilation offers a fresh set of 10 ambient tracks, each resonating with the timeless spirit of Japan. the gentle rustle of bamboo leaves, our compositions weave traditional Japanese music with nature's own symphonies of cascading waterfalls, whistling breezes, and the soft patter of rain.


As we journey deeper into the heart of Japan in this fourth instalment, game developers will find an even richer tapestry of sounds to accentuate their game worlds. Whether you're crafting an intense samurai duel, a serene tea ceremony, or a blossoming cherry tree grove, these tracks will enhance every nuance of your game's narrative.


Features:


10 premium ambient tracks, each echoing the depth and beauty of Japanese culture.

Authentic soundscapes capturing Japan's mystical landscapes and age-old traditions.

Ideal for a diverse range of game environments, from historical to contemporary settings.

Seamless compatibility with various game development platforms.


With "Japan Ambience 4", let the soulful sounds of Japan breathe life into your game, connecting players to a world where tradition and nature dance in perfect harmony.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--


Music Preview 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nOtTmvClANU

Music Preview 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nPcSweZLYo4

Music Preview 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RM3VQdcooH8


--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
technicalDetails:
Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz)

Do Sound FX loop: (No)

Number of tracks: 10

Number of cues: 10

Minutes of audio provided: 32 Minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
